summary: A Brechtian mix of political fiction, real-life footage and Country Joe McDonald music. In Chile in 1970, a young woman Peace Corps worker becomes involved with a mysterious American 'businessman' and a local revolutionary.
cast: Sandra Archer|Aníbal Reyna|Richard Stahl|Luis Alarcón|Pablo de la Barra|Sergio Zorrilla|Salvador Allende|Country Joe McDonald|Jorge Yáñez|Sergio Bravo|Óscar Castro|Poli Délano|Mónica Echeverría|Elizabeth Farnsworth|Saul Landau|Rodrigo Maturana|Pablo Neruda|Darío Pulgar|Donald Ramstead
keywords: brechtian|street fighting|street fight|street demonstration|peace corps volunteer
director: Directors: Saul Landau, Raoul Ruiz (as Raúl Ruiz) | 1 more credit »
title: ¡Qué hacer!
